bill.title: Requesting The Establishment Of A Working Group To Assess The Status Of Act 14, Special Session Laws Of Hawaii 1995, And The Hawaiian Homes Commission Act Of 1920, As Amended.
bill.description: Requesting The Establishment Of A Working Group To Assess The Status Of Act 14, Special Session Laws Of Hawaii 1995, And The Hawaiian Homes Commission Act Of 1920, As Amended.

history.action: To be offered.
Offered
Referred to WAL/JHA, FIN, referral sheet 23
Resolution scheduled to be heard by WAL/JHA on Monday, 03-22-21 2:00PM in conference room 430 & 325 Via Videoconference.

The committees on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Branco, Kong, Ohno; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) B. Kobayashi; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Ganaden; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Morikawa, McDermott.

The committees on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi, Ichiyama, LoPresti, McKelvey, Takumi, Todd, Tokioka, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) D. Kobayashi, Lowen, Nakamura.
Reported from WAL/JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1318), recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 03-30-21 11:00AM in conference room 309 Via Videoconference.
Re-scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 03-30-21 11:00AM in conference room 308 Via Videoconference.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Branco, Eli, Holt, Ilagan, B. Kobayashi, Marten, Nishimoto, Perruso, Sayama, Tam, Wildberger; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Yamashita, McDermott.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1566), recommending adoption.
Adopted with Representative(s) Ganaden voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Gates, Ohno excused (2).
Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 351).
Referred to HWN/WTL, JDC.
The committee(s) on HWN/WTL has scheduled a public hearing on 04-08-21 2:00PM; CR 016 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on HWN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HWN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Keohokalole, Acasio, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.

The committee(s) on WTL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WTL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Inouye, Misalucha, Riviere; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Fevella.
Reported from HWN/WTL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1721), as amended (SD 1), with recommendation of referral to JDC.
Report adopted, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC will hold a public decision making on 04-16-21 10:00AM; Via Videoconference.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Keohokalole, Acasio, Kim, Lee, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1788) with recommendation of adoption, as amended (SD 2).
Report and Resolution Adopted, as amended (SD 2). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 827) in amended form (SD 2).
House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
Deferred one day 04-23-21.
Received notice of House agreement (Hse. Com. No. 622)
Adopted with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite, Har, Nakamura, Tokioka excused (4).
Received notice of Adoption in House (Hse. Com. No. 631).
Resolution adopted in final form.

subjects.subject_name: Department of Land and Natural Resources
Status of Act 14, Special Session Laws of Hawaii 1995

votes.desc: House Judiciary & Hawaiian Affairs: Passed, Unamended
Senate Hawaiian Affairs: Passed, With Amendments
Senate Water and Land: Passed, With Amendments
